articles.title: American Citizen Diagnosed With Coronavirus Dies in China - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: American Citizen Diagnosed With Coronavirus Dies in China The Wall Street Journal Widespread Outcry in China Over Death of Coronavirus Doctor The New York Times Voices from Hubei, two weeks into lockdown Al Jazeera English The virus that shook China’s system …
articles.content:
BEIJINGA U.S. citizen diagnosed with the coronavirus has died in Wuhan, the Chinese city at the center of the outbreak, marking the first known American death from the disease.
The person was 60 years old and died Thursday at Wuhans Jinyintan Hospital, a spo… [+234 chars]

articles.content:
Fridays labor report for January was better than expected coming amid Chinas coronavirus outbreak that is causing global economic uncertainty. The jobs growth trend is a testament to the U.S. economys resilience, though it needs a trade-war asterisk.
